Lughnasa Miller is a senior Computer Science major at Harvey Mudd College. She focuses her studies in computer science at the system level, learning about the interaction between low level code and system components and creating embedded systems to solve problems. Outside of the classroom, you can find her playing one of the seven instruments she has learned or organizing queer community through the PRISM club and other engagements.
